revised_title: Weibull Distribution Approximation for Fibrous Composites
tldr: This article presents an alternative formulation of a probability model for fibrous composites, focusing on a 'chain of bundles' model. The author demonstrates that the strength of a bundle or a series-parallel system has an approximate Weibull distribution with a shape parameter, which is consistent with previous numerical calculations and has consequences for the size effect in composites.
